EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sir/Madam,
Our records indicate that your agency has still not validated agency details stored by IATA through the Annual Revalidation process in accordance to Resolution 812 Section 3.2.4.1
This is a kind reminder that you are requested to validate your agency details through IATA's Portal within 30 days from the initial request of notification.
Failure to do so by first deadline and in accordance with the provision of the IATA Passenger Sales Agency Rules and Resolution 812 Section 3.3.2.1, an Administrative Non-Compliance will be registered to your agency and an administrative fee will be charged to your agency, according to Resolution 812, Attachment H.
Furthermore, failure to complete the Annual Revalidation process by final deadline will result in immediate removal of Electronic Ticketing Authority and a Notice of Termination of your Passenger Sales Agency Agreement.
We trust that you will give this matter your immediate attention.
Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any queries on this matter via our Customer Service Portal at http://www.iata.org/cs.
Yours faithfully,
Agency Management International Air Transport Association ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- In order to obtain information or assistance from IATA, do not hesitate to access at any time our Customer Portal
